item.title: Instance-adaptive Zero-shot Chain-of-Thought Prompting
item.description: Instance-adaptive prompting significantly improves zero-shot Chain-of-Thought reasoning in LLMs by dynamically selecting prompts tailored to each instance, leading to consistent performance gains acro…

item.title: Semi-supervised Multi-label Learning with Balanced Binary Angular Margin Loss
item.description: S2ML2-BBAM: A new semi-supervised multi-label learning method that balances feature angle distributions to improve accuracy and fairness.
